title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Participatory Instructional Design Workshop for Dual-Language Literacy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners creatively develop one bilingual science learning activity using Participatory Design Research (PDR) methodology.
Students apply three or more translanguaging strategies that integrate native and target languages in science classes.
Based on formative assessment, learners revise and improve instructional designs at least twice incorporating peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
